org.smpp

Class SmppObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smpp.SmppObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteBuffer, ByteData, Connection, DefaultServerPDUEventListener, ProcessingThread, Queue, Session, SimpleOutbindListener, Transmitter

    public class SmppObject
extends Object
    Class SmppObject is the root of the SMPP Library class hierarchy. Every class in the library has SmppObject as a superclass except of classes in the org.smpp.debug package, exceptions and classes Data, OutbindListener and OutbindEvent.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Logica Mobile Networks SMPP Open Source Team
    See Also:
    Debug, Event

    • Field Detail

      • debug

        protected static Debug debug
        Library-wide object used for writting debug information. Every class derived from SmppObject can use this object for logging debug information.
        It is initialised to an instance of DefaultDebug class which only writes debug information to the screen.
        For tracing purposes the library reserves tracing groups 1 - 15 for internal use, see below the description of the particular groups. The implementation of Debug class is expeted to handle these groups correctly (for example ignore groups at all).
        See Also:
        Debug, DefaultDebug, FileDebug

      • event

        protected static Event event
        Library-wide object used for writting event information, basically information about exceptions. Every class derived from SmppObject can use this object for logging event information.
        It is initialised to an instance of DefaultEvent class which only writes event information to the screen.
        See Also:
        Event, DefaultEvent, FileEvent
